snippet: The Stephen Petronio Company performed at the Joyce Theater, with Wendy Whelan of City Ballet as a guest.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews dance program performed by the Stephen Petronio Company, including Petrino's latest work The Architecture of Loss, at the Joyce Theater.
lead_paragraph: The Stephen Petronio Company performed at the Joyce Theater, with Wendy Whelan of City Ballet as a guest.

headline.seo: Stephen Petronio, Joined by Wendy Whelan, at the Joyce
headline.main: Explorations of Loss, the Personal and the Public
headline.print_headline: Explorations of Loss, the Personal and the Public
